citeinfo.origin: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Cartographic Information Division
citeinfo.title: PennDOT - Rails Lines 201807

descript.purpose: Public information and support for transportation planning, design and development.
descript.supplinf: This data is intended for use at 1:24,000 or smaller scale.

cntorgp.cntorg: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Geographic Information Division

idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.2.0.700

attracc.attraccr: Verified visually by comparison against source materials.

dataqual.complete: Contains all officially recognized features within the Commonwealth.

horizpa.horizpar: Digitized from sources conforming to National Mapping Accuracy Standards for 1:24,000 scale maps.

procstep.procdesc: Digitized into Bentley Microstation system from most recently available 7.5 minute USGS topographic quadrangles on a stable (mylar) base. Updated information is added from construction plans and maps as this information becomes available. Converted to ESRI Shapefile and Geomedia Warehouse formats for distribution.
Verified visually through overlay with orthophotos as possible.
Exported to ESRI Shapefile for distribution.

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

distinfo.distliab: The USER shall indemnify, save harmless, and, if requested, defend those parties involved with the development and distribution of this data, their officers, agents, and employees from and against any suits, claims, or actions for injury, death, or property damage arising out of the use of or any defect in the FILES or any accompanying documentation.
